QuestData.Title: Doing It Like a Dunwald
QuestData.Description: They already left to hunt down the ettin that lead the attack on Dunwald. I asked them to at least give ya a chance to catch up, but I'm not sure waitin's in their blood.$B$BThey made off towards the town square, in the center of the ruins. You should go join'm before ya miss out on all the fun.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: There are few things in the highlands as terrifying as the Dunwalds reunited.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Flynn Dunwald and aid the Dunwald brothers in killing Darunga.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks for your help. You've got a warrior's spirit in ya - you coulda fooled me for a Wildhammer if it weren't for your... well.. you know.$B$BI know Firebeard sent you to unite us. My love for that dwarf runs shallow, but you know now we've got plenty of reasons to make enemies of Twilight. If you see him, tell him that when the battle starts, the Dunwald family will be there.
